uap:VisualElements.Description: Always wanted to have all your external communications in one spot? With Xeno, you can! You have unlimited options: you can chat with your leads and customers on the spot, wherever they are on the web (websites, Facebook, Twitter, etc.) Unlimited team members means you can bring them all together in one customer-orientated workspace. Xeno comes with 24/7 Smart Assistant Bot to use with your contacts and help automate Marketing Sales: save time and money! Use your chatbox on all of you websites. The app works on any device: desktops, tablets or smartphones! Xeno is here to make your life easier, check it out!
